document_name: PRODOC RECENSEMENT IDENTIFICATION DE LA POLICE NATIONALE.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/BDI/00046523/PRODOC RECENSEMENT IDENTIFICATION DE LA POLICE NATIONALE.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
• Creation of 2 national databases maintained by the police and army to register and track SALWs in compliance with requirements defined in the Nairobi Protocol for the Prevention, Control and Reduction of Small Arms and Light Weapons (SALW) in the Great Lakes Region and the Horn of Africa
• Establishment of a national ammunitions destruction site
• Establishment of a national facility to shred SALWs
• Rehabilitation of 5 FDN (army) and PNB (national police) armories in order to permit the safe and secure storage of arms stocks in conformity with OSCE recommendations

project_descr: Security Sector Reform and Small Arms activities to be funded by UNDP/BCPR and implemented within BINUB SSR-SA Section
project_title: Security Sector Reform  & Small Arms Joint Programme
